reason: Duplicate answer with batch_0142 entries (q_4_0072-q_4_0085). Same page 260 직장이탈 금지 content dump. Does not specifically address how 신분상 의무 applies in 교원 인사 업무.
Good specific question about 교원 근무시간. Source text from page 261 verified (09:00~17:00, 점심시간 포함). Answer accurately reflects source content including 탄력적 근무시간제.
Good specific question about 품위손상 행위 types. Source text from page 261 verified (품위 definition, 유형 list). Answer accurately matches source: 도박, 강절도, 사기, 폭행, 성폭행, 성희롱, 음주운전, 마약류 등.
Near-duplicate of q_4_0087 within same batch. Question '교원의 근무시간은 어떻게 되나요?' is essentially identical to q_4_0087 '교원 근무시간이 어떻게 되나요?'. Same topic, same source page, overlapping answer content.
Answer lists 5 신분상 의무 (선서, 품위유지, 정치운동금지, 집단행위금지, 겸직금지) but source.text only cites 품위유지의 의무(제63조) from page 261. 선서(제55조) is from page 260 not cited. Answer significantly exceeds cited source.
Meaningless template question: '복무일반을 분류하면 어떻게 되나요?' - awkward/unnatural phrasing for asking about regulatory categories. Answer is raw dump of source text.
Duplicate of q_4_0091: question '복무일반의 구분' is semantically identical to '복무일반을 분류하면'. Same source.text and nearly identical answer.
Duplicate answer with q_4_0091/q_4_0092: same source.text and identical answer body. Question about '예외 사항' is not specifically answered despite source containing one exception (사실상 노무에 종사하는 공무원).
Good question about 일반적 관리. Source text from page 261 verified (공휴일 근무, 출장, 탄력적 근무시간제). Answer accurately reflects page content including 적용대상, 근무시간 총량, 개인별 조정 불가 등.
Duplicate of q_4_0097: same source.text, nearly identical answer. Question asks for '정의' (definition) but source does not provide a definition of 일반적 관리, just lists its components.
